rule_text: Two system tiles are adjacent to each other if any of the tiles' edges are touching each another.   6.1 A system that has a wormhole is treated as being adjacent to a system that has a matching wormhole.   6.2 A unit or planet is adjacent to all system tiles that are adjacent to the system tile that contains that unit or planet.    A system is not adjacent to itself.    6.23 A planet counts as being adjacent to the system that contains that planet.         Movement       Neighbors       Wormholes
